remarks: Preimage maps produced by the "greater than or equal" relation are measurable sets.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 5-Feb-2017.)
statement:
orvcgteel.1 $e |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) $.
orvcgteel.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) $.
orvcgteel.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
orvcgteel $p |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC `' <_ A ) e. dom P ) $.
